did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Center.
did.unittitle: Merrill Gillespie Papers.
did.abstract: The collection primarily consists of correspondence from Michael Rumaker to Merrill Gillespie. The bulk of the correspondence dates from 1953 to 1956 when Michael Rumaker was a student at Black Mountain College.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Merrill Gillespie is a San Francisco, California.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The bulk of the collection consists of letters from Michael Rumaker to Merrill Gillespie.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Letters from Merrill Gillespie to Michael Rumaker are located in the Michael Rumaker Papers, 1957-2002. Archives & Special Collections also maintains collections of other Black Mountain artists. For detailed information on this and other related collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.
